wikipedia_page.main: Colin Arthur Garwood (born 29 June 1949 in Heacham, Norfolk) is an English former professional footballer who scored 157 goals from 426 games in the Football League playing as a striker for Peterborough United, Oldham Athletic, Huddersfield Town, Colchester United, Portsmouth and Aldershot during the 1960s, 1970s and 1980s. The £54,000 Aldershot paid Portsmouth in February 1980 was a club record.

response: *Colin Garwood (born 1949), professional footballer, was born here.
